author: aaron
msg: Add a vote to commit the same patch I just committed to HEAD, so that

author: aaron
msg: mod_so can only be built statically. If the user wants modules to
be built as DSOs by default (eg. ./configure --enable-mods-shared=most)
then we must override the default, otherwise none of the modules will
end up being installed (even though they'll get built).

author: trawick
msg: mod_log_config: Add the ability to log the id of the thread
processing the request via new %P formats.
